text:
TAMIL NADU GOVERNMENT GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY
33. Throughout the 28 of 2007 Act, except in sub-section (1) of section 1, for the expression "Anna University, Tirunelveli", wherever it occurs, the expression "Anna University of Technology, Tirunelveli" shall be substituted.
34. References to "Anna University, Tirunelveli" and "Anna University, Tirunelveli Act" in any Act or in any rule, notification, proceeding, order, regulation, by-law or other instrument made force or issued under such Act or statutes, ordinances and regulations made or continued under the principal Act shall be construed as references to "Anna University of Technology, Tirunelveli" and "Anna University of Technology, Tirunelveli Act", respectively.
105
Substitution of the
expression "Anna University of Technology, Tirunelveli",
for the
expression "Anna University, Tirunelveli".
Construction of references to "Anna University, Tirunelveli" and "Anna University, Tirunelveli Act".
